Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux AMI 2014.03 - ALAS-2017-886: important priority package update for aws-cfn-bootstrap
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux AMI that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-PENDING:
	New optional parameter "umask" introduced into cfn-hup.conf file in order to configure the cfn-hup daemon's umask.;'
